Posted By: LordRandomness (11/22/2011 12:51:06 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content: I shied away from this guy at first, since it cost a decent bit to activate his ability, and it only lasts a single turn. I was wrong to underestimate him like that though. His true strength is realized in multiplayer, where you have a wide variety of options to chose from, which he can become a copy of at instant speed, as you need it. Not an efficient offensive threat generally, but a very strong reactive control piece with stronger utility as your opponents play stronger things. His main downside is that he will already be chilling on the board before you can use his copy ability (unless you pull off some kind of flash combo or whatever), so your opponent has the opportunity to work around him if they are able. He deserves his current 4/5 in my opinion.
posts.html:

Not an efficient offensive threat generally, but a very strong reactive control piece with stronger utility as your opponents play stronger things. His main downside is that he will already be chilling on the board before you can use his copy ability (unless you pull off some kind of flash combo or whatever), so your opponent has the opportunity to work around him if they are able. He deserves his current 4/5 in my opinion.

Posted By: ProbablyThatGuy (1/2/2012 11:37:27 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content: I found a lot of use in this guy in my [Quest for Ula's Temple](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Quest for Ula's Temple) deck. He's the cheapest Leviathan in the game that I can drop him on turn 2 after Quest and he can provide a great defense considering I can use him to block just about anything that swings at me. After Quest gets its three counters, he can become a [Stormtide Leviathan](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Stormtide Leviathan), [Nemesis of Reason](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Nemesis of Reason), or I can swing with him and after blockers and stuff have been declared, I can get him to copy [Grozoth](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Grozoth) for a 9/9 beatstick to get around the defender. This thing is sweet. 4.5/5
posts.html:
I found a lot of use in this guy in my Quest for Ula's Temple deck. This thing is sweet. 4.5/5
